title: Drawing, "Wooded landscape with a pond", mid-17th century
medium: Black chalk, pen and ink on paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Trees are at left and in the right middle plane. A part of the pond is shown in front of the latter. A man kneels at its edge, another is shown from the back seated and raising his right hand toward a boat. A peasant's house is beyond the pond. Mountains are in the background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Wooded landscape with a pond", mid-17th century.
mid-17th century. Black chalk, pen and ink on paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1.
